Is Glass-Chapman-Hockley syndrome inherited ?,"How is Glass-Chapman-Hockley syndrome inherited? Based on the only family that has been reported in the medical literature, to date, the syndrome is believed to be inherited in an autosomal dominant manner.",GARD,Glass-Chapman-Hockley syndrome
